hero.title: Build real-world skills.
hero.subtitle: Master software development by building real-world projects that prepare you for the job.

bullets.text: UTS graduate with 3+ years of IT consulting experience in Australia
Passionate about teaching, knowledge sharing, and collaborative project development
Focused on .NET, full-stack engineering, and cloud-based solutions
Actively sharing insights on IT work in Australia and career transitions into tech

goal.title: Goal for my services
goal.description: Get you closer to the way real teams work: production habits, collaboration patterns, and the core software concepts that make you confident shipping to employers.

pillars.label: Workplace readiness
pillars.note: Code, review, and ship like a team member

pillars.label: Confidence
pillars.note: From first commit to production deploys
